snippet: The Pentagon has seized a trove of emails and documents as it widens an investigation into Central Command over accusations that officials had overstated the progress of airstrikes against the Islamic State.
abstract: Pentagon inquiry deepens into allegations that United States Central Command falsified reports on fight against Islamic State in Iraq in attempt to mask American military's failures; files seized by Pentagon and analyzed by expanded number of investigators tell story of militant group's rapid and startling rise to power.

byline.original: By MATT APUZZO, MARK MAZZETTI and MICHAEL S. SCHMIDT

lead_paragraph: The Pentagon has seized a trove of emails and documents as it widens an investigation into Central Command over accusations that officials had overstated the progress of airstrikes against the Islamic State.

headline.main: Pentagon Expands Inquiry Into Intelligence on ISIS Surge
headline.print_headline: Inquiry Grows Into Intelligence on ISIS Surge
